scripts.list-steps: env-cmd cucumber-js --tags 'not (@angular or @skip)' --require-module @babel/register --require step-definitions --format usage-json  | grep 'pattern"' | sed -e 's/    "pattern": "//' | sed -e 's/",//' | sort
scripts.test-local: env-cmd -f .env.local cucumber-js  --tags 'not (@angular or @skip)' --require-module @babel/register --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty
scripts.test-testnet: env-cmd cucumber-js  --tags 'not (@angular or @skip)' --require-module @babel/register --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty
scripts.test-testnet-specific: env-cmd cucumber-js --tags 'not (@angular or @skip)' --retry 2 --require-module @babel/register --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty ${TESTPATTERN}
